content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "browse_website" command to search for the best kayaking routes in Norway on the website https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/ and received a list of the top 10 kayaking routes recommended by Eirik Ver√•s Larsen, along with a paddling code for safety. The website also provided tips and a list of companies for various outdoor activities, but there was an advertisement for skiing with no information on kayaking routes. The links provided were: https://www.visitnorway.com/, https://www.visitnorway.com/, https://www.visitnorway.com/search/?q=, https://www.visitnorway.com/places-to-go/, and https://www.visitnorway.com/places-to-go/fjord-norway/.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "top_kayaking_routes.txt", "text": "The top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Ver\\u00e5s Larsen are:\\n1. Lofoten Islands\\n2. Helgeland\\n3. Geirangerfjord\\n4. Jotunheimen\\n5. Aurlandsfjord\\n6. Rondane National Park\\n7. Sognefjord\\n8. Voss\\n9. Hardangerfjord\\n10. Telemark Canal\\n\\nPaddling code for safety:\\n- Always wear a life jacket\\n- Never paddle alone\\n- Bring a map and compass\\n- Be prepared for changing weather conditions\\n\\nFor more information and tips, visit https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
